attributes.action: Disabled Access - Stop Changes At Theme Parks
attributes.additional_details:
Petition Statement

Theme Parks is planning to end the Guest Assistance Card Program at Theme Parks. We need to communicate how this change will impact the families of people with disabilities. Our voices need to be heard. The proposed change will prevent our families from being able to access the park and will result in fewer visits by those impacted by special needs.

Please Stop these changes at Theme Parks.
